code: import react from'react';import axios from'axios';var baseUrl="/api/persons";var getAll=function getAll(){var request=axios.get(baseUrl);return request.then(function(res){return res.data;});};var create=function create(object){var request=axios.post(baseUrl,object);return request.then(function(res){return res.data;});};var update=function update(id){var request=axios.delete("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id),{params:{id:id}});return request.then(function(res){return res.data;});};var replace=function replace(id,object){var request=axios.put("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id),object);return request.then(function(res){return res.data;});};export default{getAll:getAll,create:create,update:update,replace:replace};
